_comment: Administration Role for CrowdStrike Root EB StackSet
Execution Role for CrowdStrike Root EB StackSet
REQUIRED: Root OU (e.g. r-****) to provision StackSet Roles against each account
REQUIRED: Comma-separated list of OUs for FalconClientIdA & FalconSecretA
REQUIRED: Falcon CID for OUA, FalconClientIdA & FalconSecretA
REQUIRED: CrowdStrike Falcon OAuth2 Client ID for OUA (32 character hex string)
REQUIRED: CrowdStrike Falcon OAuth2 API Secret for OUA (40+ character string)
CrowdStrike Falcon Cloud for OUA. Options: us1, us2, eu1, usgov1, usgov2
OPTIONAL: Comma-separated list of OUs for FalconClientIdB & FalconSecretB. Leave empty if only using one CID
OPTIONAL: Falcon CID for OUB, FalconClientIdB & FalconSecretB. Leave empty if only using one CID
OPTIONAL: CrowdStrike Falcon OAuth2 Client ID for OUB. Leave empty if only using one CID
OPTIONAL: CrowdStrike Falcon OAuth2 API Secret for OUB. Leave empty if only using one CID
CrowdStrike Falcon Cloud for OUB. Options: us1, us2, eu1, usgov1, usgov2
Choose False to Create CloudTrail for Read-Only Indicators of Attack. Options: True, False
Enable Identity Protection. Options: True, False
Choose True to enable Indicators of Attack. Options: True, False
Enable Sensor Management. Options: True, False
AWS Account Type. Options: commercial, govcloud
How Falcon API credentials are stored. Options: lambda (environment variables), secret (AWS Secrets Manager)
Only required if connecting Commercial AWS to GovCloud Falcon.  Comma-separated list of regions to enable IOA (No Spaces). Example: us-east-1,us-west-2,eu-west-1
S3 URL for CSPM Onboarding Template (Commercial Only)
